name: Donna K. Slonim
content: Donna Slonim Donna Slonim Home CV Research BCB Group Publications Teaching Jobs Contact Information Academic year 2025-26: I am on sabbatical this year. I thus won't be on campus reliably and will not be holding office hours. We do plan for CS 167 to be taught in the spring of 2026, probably by Prof. Lenore Cowen. If you need to contact me for another purpose, I can be reached through my Tufts email address. Senior advisees: If you are looking to collect my signature on your graduation paperwork, click here for departmental instructions. TL;DR: I don't need to sign, but what you do need to do varies by program and school, so check the link for details. Dept. of Computer Science Joyce Cummings Center, room 322 177 College Ave Tufts University Medford, MA 02155 E-mail Office : JCC 322 Phone : 617-627-2225 Fax : 617-627-2227 Professor, Department of Computer Science Professor, Department of Immunology, Tufts University School of Medicine Faculty, Program in Genetics, Molecular, and Cellular Biology, Graduate School of Biomedical Sciences
